page.title: 16MARSTON AND PALMER LIMITED
page.content: Marston Palmer Limited is situated on the Wobaston Road ,Fordhouses .It was founded in 1740 .It covers 71 acres of land ,one tenth of this land is used for recreational use .It employs 930 people of which 174 are women .The highest amount of people ever employed is 8000.The first factory,which was situated in Wolverhampton was a sheet metal works.In 1871 the family who founded the company died . John Marston who had trained as an apprentice for the company decided to purchase it.In 1877 Marstons manufactured the sunbeam two speed pushbike.
